items.title: Awesome Nix
items.content_text:
### Resources / Learning

*   [Nix Pills](https://nixos.org/guides/nix-pills/) - The best way to learn, with examples.

### Deployment Tools / Discovery

*   [Nixery (⭐1.9k)](https://github.com/tazjin/nixery) - A Docker-compatible container registry which builds images ad-hoc via Nix.

### Command-Line Tools / Discovery

*   [comma (⭐1.3k)](https://github.com/nix-community/comma) - Quickly run any binary; wraps together `nix run` and `nix-index`.
*   [nix-diff (⭐407)](https://github.com/Gabriella439/nix-diff) - A tool to explain why two Nix derivations differ.

### Development / Discovery

*   [lorri (⭐798)](https://github.com/nix-community/lorri/) - A much better `nix-shell` for development that augments direnv.

### Programming Languages / Elm

*   [elm2nix (⭐116)](https://github.com/cachix/elm2nix) - Convert `elm.json` into Nix expressions.

### Programming Languages / Node.js

*   [Napalm (⭐112)](https://github.com/nix-community/napalm) - Support for building npm packages in Nix with a lightweight npm registry.
*   [npmlock2nix (⭐136)](https://github.com/nix-community/npmlock2nix) - Generate Nix expressions from a `package-lock.json` (in-memory), primarily for web projects.

### Programming Languages / Rust

*   [cargo2nix (⭐423)](https://github.com/cargo2nix/cargo2nix) - Granular caching, development shell, Nix & Rust integration.
items.content_html:
Resources / Learning

  • Nix Pills - The best way to learn, with examples.

Deployment Tools / Discovery

  • Nixery (⭐1.9k) - A Docker-compatible container registry which builds images ad-hoc via Nix.

Command-Line Tools / Discovery

  • comma (⭐1.3k) - Quickly run any binary; wraps together nix run and nix-index.
  • nix-diff (⭐407) - A tool to explain why two Nix derivations differ.

Development / Discovery

  • lorri (⭐798) - A much better nix-shell for development that augments direnv.

Programming Languages / Elm

  • elm2nix (⭐116) - Convert elm.json into Nix expressions.

Programming Languages / Node.js

  • Napalm (⭐112) - Support for building npm packages in Nix with a lightweight npm registry.
  • npmlock2nix (⭐136) - Generate Nix expressions from a package-lock.json (in-memory), primarily for web projects.

Programming Languages / Rust

  • cargo2nix (⭐423) - Granular caching, development shell, Nix & Rust integration.

items.title: Awesome Go
items.content_text:
### Configuration

*   [kong (⭐2.7k)](https://github.com/alecthomas/kong) - Command-line parser with support for arbitrarily complex command-line structures and additional sources of configuration such as YAML, JSON, TOML, etc (successor to `kingpin`).

### Caches

*   [go-cache (⭐157)](https://github.com/viney-shih/go-cache) - A flexible multi-layer Go caching library to deal with in-memory and shared cache by adopting Cache-Aside pattern.
*   [gocache (⭐2.7k)](https://github.com/eko/gocache) - A complete Go cache library with multiple stores (memory, memcache, redis, ...), chainable, loadable, metrics cache and more.

### Database Schema Migration

*   [gorm-seeder (⭐16)](https://github.com/Kachit/gorm-seeder) - Simple database seeder for Gorm ORM.

### Financial

*   [ach (⭐492)](https://github.com/moov-io/ach) - A reader, writer, and validator for Automated Clearing House (ACH) files.

### Logging

*   [go-log (⭐11)](https://github.com/pieterclaerhout/go-log) - A logging library with stack traces, object dumping and optional timestamps.

### Networking

*   [fullproxy (⭐82)](https://github.com/shoriwe/fullproxy) - A fully featured scriptable and daemon configurable proxy and pivoting toolkit with SOCKS5, HTTP, raw ports and reverse proxy protocols.

### HTTP Clients

*   [go-zoox/fetch (⭐79)](https://github.com/go-zoox/fetch) - A Powerful, Lightweight, Easy Http Client, inspired by Web Fetch API.

### Regular Expressions

*   [rex (⭐204)](https://github.com/hedhyw/rex) - Regular expressions builder.

### Third-party APIs

*   [goami2 (⭐17)](https://github.com/staskobzar/goami2) - AMI v2 library for Asterisk PBX.

### Utilities

*   [countries (⭐458)](https://github.com/biter777/countries) - Full implementation of ISO-3166-1, ISO-4217, ITU-T E.164, Unicode CLDR and IANA ccTLD standards.
*   [evaluator (⭐42)](https://github.com/nullne/evaluator) - Evaluate an expression dynamically based on s-expression. It's simple and easy to extend.
*   [jsend (⭐22)](https://github.com/clevergo/jsend) - JSend's implementation written in Go.
*   [lancet (⭐5.1k)](https://github.com/duke-git/lancet) - A comprehensive, efficient, and reusable util function library of go.

### DevOps Tools / Libraries for creating HTTP middlewares

*   [abbreviate (⭐222)](https://github.com/dnnrly/abbreviate) - abbreviate is a tool turning long strings in to shorter ones with configurable separators, for example to embed branch names in to deployment stack IDs.

### Websites / Libraries for creating HTTP middlewares

*   [Golang Developer Jobs](https://golangjob.xyz) - Developer Jobs exclusively for Golang related Roles.
items.content_html:
Configuration

  • kong (⭐2.7k) - Command-line parser with support for arbitrarily complex command-line structures and additional sources of configuration such as YAML, JSON, TOML, etc (successor to kingpin).

Caches

  • go-cache (⭐157) - A flexible multi-layer Go caching library to deal with in-memory and shared cache by adopting Cache-Aside pattern.
  • gocache (⭐2.7k) - A complete Go cache library with multiple stores (memory, memcache, redis, ...), chainable, loadable, metrics cache and more.

Database Schema Migration

  • gorm-seeder (⭐16) - Simple database seeder for Gorm ORM.

Financial

  • ach (⭐492) - A reader, writer, and validator for Automated Clearing House (ACH) files.

Logging

  • go-log (⭐11) - A logging library with stack traces, object dumping and optional timestamps.

Networking

  • fullproxy (⭐82) - A fully featured scriptable and daemon configurable proxy and pivoting toolkit with SOCKS5, HTTP, raw ports and reverse proxy protocols.

HTTP Clients

  • go-zoox/fetch (⭐79) - A Powerful, Lightweight, Easy Http Client, inspired by Web Fetch API.

Regular Expressions

  • rex (⭐204) - Regular expressions builder.

Third-party APIs

  • goami2 (⭐17) - AMI v2 library for Asterisk PBX.

Utilities

  • countries (⭐458) - Full implementation of ISO-3166-1, ISO-4217, ITU-T E.164, Unicode CLDR and IANA ccTLD standards.
  • evaluator (⭐42) - Evaluate an expression dynamically based on s-expression. It's simple and easy to extend.
  • jsend (⭐22) - JSend's implementation written in Go.
  • lancet (⭐5.1k) - A comprehensive, efficient, and reusable util function library of go.

DevOps Tools / Libraries for creating HTTP middlewares

  • abbreviate (⭐222) - abbreviate is a tool turning long strings in to shorter ones with configurable separators, for example to embed branch names in to deployment stack IDs.

Websites / Libraries for creating HTTP middlewares

  • Golang Developer Jobs - Developer Jobs exclusively for Golang related Roles.

items.title: Awesome Openstreetmap
items.content_text:
### Tasking Managers / Web Services

*   [OSM Streak](http://streak.osmz.ru/) - OSM Streak makes you do small tasks for OSM every day. Tasks are small and about five minutes each, but the point is to map every day, not map as much as you can. ([Source Code (⭐24)](https://github.com/Zverik/osmstreak))
items.content_html:
Tasking Managers / Web Services

  • OSM Streak - OSM Streak makes you do small tasks for OSM every day. Tasks are small and about five minutes each, but the point is to map every day, not map as much as you can. (Source Code (⭐24))

items.title: Awesome Selfhosted
items.content_text:
### Software / Communication - Custom Communication Systems

*   [Shhh (⭐401)](https://github.com/smallwat3r/shhh) - Keep secrets out of emails or chat logs, share them using secure links with passphrase and expiration dates. `MIT` `Python`
items.content_html:
